item.title: 美国银行加入美国银行借贷狂潮，发行债券融资
item.description: 美国银行公司已启动投资级美元债券的发售，此举进一步加剧了华尔街主要银行的密集发债浪潮。【原文：Bank of America Corp. has kicked off the sale of investment-grade dollar bonds, adding to a flurry of offerings by major Wall Street banks.】

item.title: 人工智能能否战胜蝴蝶效应？这场撼动气象界的辩论
item.description:
谷歌、微软和英伟达等公司正竞相提升长期天气预报的准确性。

【原文：

Google, Microsoft y Nvidia son algunas de las empresas que compiten por mejorar la precisión de las previsiones del clima a largo plazo.

】

item.title: 墨西哥推出以能源为核心的投资计划，助力经济提振
item.description: 墨西哥政府计划到2030年向能源项目及其他公共工程投入5.6万亿比索（约合3230亿美元），此举旨在提振近年来几乎停滞不前的经济。【原文：Mexico’s government plans to invest 5.6 trillion pesos ($323 billion) into energy projects and other public works through 2030, part of a bid to boost an economy that has barely expanded in recent years.】

item.title: 银行家们在开局动荡后，为2021年以来最繁忙的IPO周做准备
item.description: 八家公司计划在即将到来的美国首次公开募股最繁忙的一周内，共同筹集39亿美元资金，这将是四年来最繁忙的一周。【原文：Eight companies are targeting a collective $3.9 billion in what’s set to be the busiest week for US initial public offerings in more than four years.】

item.title: 加拿大寻求解决湾流纠纷，此前特朗普曾发出威胁
item.description: 加拿大政府表示，在特朗普总统提出投诉后，正与美国联邦航空管理局、通用动力公司和庞巴迪公司合作，处理湾流部分私人飞机型号的认证问题。【原文：The Canadian government says it is working with the US Federal Aviation Administration, General Dynamics Corp. and Bombardier Inc. to address certification issues for some of Gulfstream’s private jet models after a complaint made by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 派拉蒙的埃里森婉拒了华纳兄弟的听证会邀请。
item.description: 派拉蒙天空舞影业公司首席执行官大卫·埃里森拒绝了参议院的传唤，未出席关于网飞公司与华纳兄弟探索公司拟议合并案的反垄断听证会。【原文：Paramount Skydance Corp. Chief Executive Officer David Ellison turned down an invitation to testify before the Senate at an antitrust hearing about the proposed tie-up between Netflix Inc. and Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.】

item.title: Citadel证券分析师鲁布纳称，随着散户热情消退，股市反弹面临风险
item.description: 散户投资者对美股的热情正面临严峻考验，此前推动上月股市上涨的创纪录买盘浪潮已显露疲态。【原文：Retail traders’ appetite for US equities faces a tough test as the record buying wave that powered last month’s rally shows signs of fatigue.】

item.title: 标普称非洲评级升至2020年以来最高水平，因经济增长强劲
item.description: 据标普全球评级称，经济改革和增长改善已将非洲主权信用评级推升至五年多来的最高水平，且前景依然乐观。【原文：Economic reforms and improved growth have lifted African sovereign credit ratings to their highest level in over five years, and the outlook remains positive, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: Crypto.com在超级碗前推出纯预测平台
item.description: 加密货币平台Crypto.com周二宣布，将在超级碗开赛前数日推出专属预测市场平台OG。【原文：Crypto.com is launching a dedicated platform, OG, for prediction markets just days before the Super Bowl, the company said Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国敦促欧盟保持贸易开放，以应对"欧洲制造"的担忧
item.description: 英国财政大臣瑞秋·里夫斯敦促欧盟官员维持与英国的贸易联系，此前有担忧称欧盟可能采取更多保护主义的产业政策，从而损害英国企业利益。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves urged the European Union officials to maintain trade links with the UK amid concerns that the bloc could adopt more protectionist industrial policies that penalize British companies.】

item.title: 菲尔·米克尔森力荐的Sable公司遭美国证交会调查内幕交易
item.description: 美国政府已传唤总部位于得克萨斯州的石油钻探公司Sable Offshore Corp.，此前Hunterbrook Media指控该公司向投资者（包括职业高尔夫球手菲尔·米克尔森）选择性披露信息。【原文：The US government has subpoenaed Texas-based oil driller Sable Offshore Corp. following allegations by Hunterbrook Media that the company selectively disclosed information to investors, including pro golfer Phil Mickelson.】

item.title: 南非酒店集团收购约翰内斯堡标志性场馆股权
item.description: 南非酒店集团南方阳光有限公司将从自由集团手中收购约翰内斯堡商业中心区四处物业的50%股权，其中包括桑顿会议中心。【原文：South African hotel group Southern Sun Ltd. will buy a 50% stake in four properties in Johannesburg’s business hub, including the Sandton Convention Centre, from Liberty Group.】

item.title: 美国股市徘徊在历史高点边缘，Palantir财报亮眼
item.description: 周二美国股市方向不明，因政府停摆导致经济数据延迟发布，企业财报成为市场焦点。【原文：US stocks struggled for direction on Tuesday as earnings took center stage following the delay of economic data due to the government shutdown.】

item.title: 沃尔玛跻身万亿俱乐部，科技与节俭型消费者推动业绩增长
item.description: 沃尔玛公司股价周二强劲上涨，推动其市值首次突破万亿美元大关，使这家全球最大零售商跻身英伟达公司和字母表公司等科技巨头通常占据的行列。【原文：A rally in Walmart Inc. shares pushed its market capitalization past $1 trillion on Tuesday for the first time ever, vaulting the world’s largest retailer into a category typically occupied by Big Tech firms such as Nvidia Corp. and Alphabet Inc.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油运输量保持稳定，而对印度的运输量却大幅下滑
item.description:
中国在1月份重新成为俄罗斯海运原油的最大进口国

【原文：

China resumed its position as the biggest importer of Russian seaborne crude in January

】

item.title: 俄罗斯炼油厂因乌克兰袭击减少而获得喘息
item.description: 乌克兰无人机对俄罗斯炼油厂的袭击在1月份降至六个月来最低水平，这使得克里姆林宫得以增加对国内市场的燃料供应，并恢复汽油出口。【原文：Ukrainian drone strikes on Russian refineries dropped to a six-month low in January, allowing the Kremlin to increase fuel supplies to the domestic market and resume gasoline exports.】

item.title: 德国借贷成本升至2011年以来最高水平，因政府支出激增
item.description: 德国基准30年期国债收益率攀升至2011年以来最高水平，因投资者要求更高溢价以抵消其需承担的创纪录债务负担。【原文：The yield on Germany’s benchmark 30-year bond climbed to the highest since 2011 as investors demand higher premiums to account for the record debt burden they need to absorb.】

item.title: 便利店企业Arko旗下燃料部门寻求2.1亿美元IPO融资
item.description: 便利店企业Arko Corp.旗下的燃料批发子公司Arko Petroleum Corp.正计划通过首次公开募股筹集高达2.1亿美元资金，此次上市可能使该公司估值接近10亿美元。【原文：Arko Petroleum Corp., the fuel wholesaler subsidiary of convenience store firm Arko Corp., is seeking to raise as much as $210 million in an initial public offering that could value the company close to $1 billion.】

item.title: Cipher公司通过垃圾债市场融资，用于建设亚马逊关联数据中心
item.description: Cipher Mining Inc.计划在美国垃圾债券市场筹集20亿美元资金，用于资助与亚马逊公司相关的数据中心建设。【原文：Cipher Mining Inc. is seeking to raise $2 billion in the US junk bond market to help fund construction of a data center tied to Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 埃隆·马斯克旗下xAI公司因Grok生成性化图像面临英国第二次调查
item.description: 英国数据保护监管机构正对埃隆·马斯克旗下的xAI公司展开调查，因其人工智能聊天机器人Grok被用于生成并传播他人性化图像的行为引发监管审查升级。【原文：Elon Musk’s xAI is under investigation by the UK’s data protection watchdog, as regulatory scrutiny ramps up of the way its artificial intelligence chatbot Grok was used to generate and share sexualized imagery of people.】

item.title: 印度称5000亿美元美国采购协议包含现有项目
item.description: 印度与美国达成协议，将在五年内采购价值5000亿美元的商品。新德里一位官员表示，该协议既包含现有项目储备，也涵盖数据中心和能源等新增支出领域。【原文：India’s agreement with the US to buy $500 billion-worth of goods over five years includes an existing pipeline of projects, as well as new areas of spending, such as data centers and energy, an official in New Delhi said.】

item.title: 多伦多、卑诗省养老金在经历美国市场剧烈震荡后寻求海外避风港
item.description: 上周，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普暗示对美元近期走弱持接受态度，导致美元汇率大幅下跌。部分加拿大养老金管理机构正采信其言论。【原文：President Donald Trump sent the US dollar tumbling last week by suggesting he was comfortable with its recent weakness. Some Canadian pension managers are taking him at his word.】

item.title: 美联储巴金聚焦通胀目标实现的"最后一公里"
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆·巴金表示，去年的降息举措已助力劳动力市场回暖，而官员们当前正致力于将通胀率降至央行目标水平。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said last year’s interest-rate reductions have helped bolster the labor market as officials now look to bring inflation back down to the central bank’s target.】

item.title: 米兰称美联储今年需降息逾一个百分点
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰表示，由于经济中缺乏强劲的价格压力，他所称的限制性利率今年需要再次下调。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said the absence of strong price pressures in the economy means interest rates, which he described as restrictive, need to be lowered again this year.】

item.title: 哈达德称曾向卢拉推荐央行职位人选
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多·哈达德提名两名经济学家竞选央行董事会空缺席位，但表示总统路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦尚未就提名作出决定。【原文：Brazil Finance Minister Fernando Haddad pitched two economists for open seats on the central bank board, but said President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva hasn’t yet made a decision on the nominees.】

item.title: 在体育产业蓬勃发展的背景下，Otro公司为其首支收购基金筹集了12亿美元资金。
item.description: 奥托资本为其首只旗舰私募股权基金募集了12亿美元资金。这家专注于体育领域的公司正借势大型机构投资者对这一新兴资产类别日益高涨的需求。【原文：Otro Capital raised $1.2 billion for its first flagship private equity fund, as the sports-focused firm capitalizes on soaring demand from large institutional investors for the burgeoning asset class.】

item.title: 中国投机性淘金热考验北京风险偏好
item.description: 尽管官员们欢迎广泛的市场参与，但任何威胁社会凝聚力的行为都必然会引发负面关注。【原文：While broad market participation is welcomed by officials, any threat to social cohesion is sure to attract negative attention.】

item.title: 巴西央行对即将实施的降息幅度持开放态度
item.description: 巴西央行表示，将根据董事会成员对仍显现出混合信号的经济数据的审议结果，逐步确定即将到来的货币宽松周期的规模和持续时间。【原文：Brazil’s central bank said it will determine the size and length of its coming monetary easing cycle over time as board members mull economic data that is still showing mixed signals.】

item.title: 伊朗风险为石油算法交易提供三年低迷后的首次考验
item.description: 算法交易者在原油市场已连续三年亏损，创下有记录以来最长的低迷期。随着地缘政治动荡加剧，市场对2026年扭亏为盈的期望正面临早期考验。【原文：Algorithmic traders have racked up a third straight year of losses in oil, the longest slump on record, with hopes for a turnaround in 2026 facing an early test amid geopolitical volatility.】

item.title: 苹果iPhone 17升级正中中国消费者下怀
item.description: 苹果在中国创下最佳iPhone销售业绩的种子早在数年前便已埋下。【原文：The seeds for Apple’s best iPhone sales in China were planted years earlier】
